item.description:

item.title: 【Prompt Engineering vs Context Engineering】即时工程与情境工程
item.description:
【

As AI integration becomes standard in modern applications, developers face a very critical decision: How do we effectively communicate with large language models (LLMs) to get reliable and accurate results? The answer lies in understanding two distinct  but often confused approaches: prompt engineering and context engineering.

While these terms are frequently used interchangeably, they represent fundamentally different strategies for working with AI systems. Understanding their differences is important for building robust and production-ready applications that leverage LLMs effectively.

】

随着人工智能集成成为现代应用程序的标准，开发人员面临着一个非常关键的决策：我们如何与大型语言模型 (LLM) 有效地沟通以获得可靠且准确的结果？答案在于理解两种不同但经常混淆的方法：即时工程和情境工程。

虽然这些术语经常互换使用，但它们代表了使用人工智能系统的根本不同的策略。了解它们的差异对于构建有效利用法学硕士的强大且可用于生产的应用程序非常重要。

item.title: 【How Does a Scrum Master Improve the Productivity of the Development Team?】Scrum Master 如何提高开发团队的生产力？
item.description:
【

The role of a Scrum Master is to establish Scrum, and the Scrum Master is accountable for the Scrum Team’s effectiveness. Thus, it is quite tempting to ask how a Scrum Master can help improve the productivity of the development team. But, in a complex working environment like software development, productivity is often not the right measure to showcase all the complexities of software developers’ knowledge work.       

In simple working environments, productivity means a ratio of output to input. The traditional idea is to know how much is achieved (output) with a given amount of resources (inputs), largely in numbers, and the focus is on maximizing the output. That’s why, in traditional project management of software development projects, stakeholders evaluate the development team’s productivity based on the lines of code. Or, even today in Agile project management, stakeholders with a traditional mindset ask for the number of story points per iteration, known as Sprint Velocity.   

】

Scrum Master 的角色是建立 Scrum，Scrum Master 对 Scrum 团队的有效性负责。因此，人们很容易会问 Scrum Master 如何帮助提高开发团队的生产力。但是，在软件开发等复杂的工作环境中，生产力通常不是展示软件开发人员知识工作的所有复杂性的正确衡量标准。       

在简单的工作环境中，生产力意味着产出与投入的比率。传统的想法是知道在给定数量的资源（投入）（主要是数量）下实现了多少（产出），重点是最大化产出。这就是为什么在软件开发项目的传统项目管理中，利益相关者根据代码行数来评估开发团队的生产力。或者，即使在今天的敏捷项目管理中，具有传统心态的利益相关者也会要求每次迭代的故事点数量，称为冲刺速度。

item.title: 【Workload Identities: Bridging Infrastructure and Application Security】工作负载身份：桥接基础设施和应用程序安全
item.description:
【

Infrastructure security has long been about protecting networks, hosts, and cloud platforms. Application security focuses on securing APIs, data flows, and business logic to protect critical assets. Both approaches are critical, but they can’t provide complete protection on their own. When isolated from each other, there is a higher risk that attackers can exploit the security gaps in either layer, which is why workload identities should be employed to serve as a bridge that unifies both layers.

The Two Security Worlds: Infrastructure vs. Application

Infrastructure security is about protecting the foundation, including measures such as network segmentation, least-privilege identity and access management (IAM) roles, container isolation, and applying zero-trust principles at the infrastructure level. Application security works higher up in the stack, closer to data and user interactions. It deals with authentication, authorization, token management, session handling, and API protection. 

】

基础设施安全长期以来一直致力于保护网络、主机和云平台。应用程序安全侧重于保护 API、数据流和业务逻辑，以保护关键资产。这两种方法都很重要，但它们本身无法提供完整的保护。当彼此隔离时，攻击者利用任一层中的安全漏洞的风险更高，这就是为什么应采用工作负载身份作为统一两层的桥梁的原因。

两个安全世界：基础设施与应用程序

基础设施安全是为了保护基础，包括网络分段、最低权限身份和访问管理 (IAM) 角色、容器隔离以及在基础设施级别应用零信任原则等措施。应用程序安全性在堆栈中的较高位置工作，更接近数据和用户交互。它处理身份验证、授权、令牌管理、会话处理和 API 保护。
